des: "Use this filling with sweet, paper thin crepes (I recommend Ann's 'Dessert Crepes' recipe here on allrecipes) and fruit for a satisfying weekend breakfast! Serving Suggestions: Fill slightly cooled crepes with the creamy mixture and top with fruit and whipped cream."
ins: Combine the cream cheese substitute, sugar, vanilla extract, and coconut milk with an electric mixer until smooth and creamy.
